title: Mastery Symbol Collides with Mastery Score on Profile
body:
If you hover over your Profile's bordered champion for mastery, the top three mastery champions come up. 

It should have the mastery symbol to the left of the points value, but instead it's merging right over the values.

I don't know if anyone else has this issue.

replies.body:
This is what it's like when words COLLIDE!

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lsV500W4BHU
